<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="4869" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">At</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="PRP$">my</word>
			<word type="NN">door</word>
			<word type="DT">the</word>
			<word type="NNS">leaves</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBP">are</word>
		<word type="VBG">falling</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=":">;</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">A</word>
		<word type="JJ">cold</word>
		<word type="JJ">wild</word>
		<word type="NN">wind</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">has</word>
		<word type="VBN">come</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
<sentence id="4870" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NNS">Sweethearts</word>
		<word type="NN">walk</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PP">
		<word type="IN">by</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="ADVP">
		<word type="RB">together</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=":">;</word>
	</chink>
	<chink>
		<word type="CC">And</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP">I</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="RB">still</word>
		<word type="JJ">miss</word>
		<word type="NN">someone</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","3"
